Description.Name: Alice Carter
Description.Details: Alice Carter, known as "Nova", is a determined and agile MechWarrior hailing from New Avalon. Enamored by BattleMechs since childhood, she joined the Davion MechWarrior Academy, swiftly rising through the ranks with her lightning-fast reflexes and tactical brilliance. Despite a serious injury during combat, Alice's resilience prevailed, as she integrated cybernetic enhancements into her Mech, exemplifying unwavering bravery and inspiring her comrades in the Federated Suns' cause. On the battlefield, "Nova" remains a symbol of hope and an indomitable force.
